title: Hymnal 1982: according to the use of the Episcopal Church
text:
1 O love that casts out fear,

O love that casts out sin,

tarry no more without,

but come and dwell within.


2 True sunlight of the soul,

surround us as we go;

so shall our way be safe,

our feet no straying know.


3 Great love of God, come in!

Well-spring of heavenly peace;

thou Living Water, come!

Spring up, and never cease.


4 Love of the living God,

of Father and of Son;

love of the Holy Ghost, 

fill thou each needy one.

title: Rejoice in the Lord
text:
1 O love that casts out fear,

O love that casts out sin,

remain no more without,

but come and dwell within.


2 True sunlight of the soul,

surround us as we go;

so shall our way be safe,

our feet no straying know.


3 Great love of God, come in,

well-spring of heav'nly peace;

thou living water, come:

spring up, and never cease.

title: The Hymnal: as authorized and approved by the General Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church in the United States of America in the year of our Lord 1916
text:
O Love that casts out fear,

O Love that casts out sin,

Tarry no more without,

But come and dwell within!


True sunlight of the soul,

Surround us as we go;

So shall our way be safe,

Our feet no straying know.


215

Great love of God, come in!

Wellspring of heavenly peace;

Thou Living Water, come!

Spring up, and never cease.


Love of the living God,

Of Father and of Son;

Love of the Holy Ghost,

Fill thou each needy one.


Amen.

title: The Hymnal, Revised and Enlarged, as adopted by the General Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church in the United States of America in the year of our Lord 1892
text:
1 O love that casts out fear,

O Love that casts out sin,

Tarry no more without,

But come and dwell within!


2 True sunlight of the soul,

Surround us as we go;

So shall our way be safe,

Our feet no straying know.


3 Great love of God, come in!

Well-spring of heavenly peace;

Thou Living Water, come!

Spring up, and never cease.


4 Love of the living God,

Of Father and of Son;

Love of the Holy Ghost,

Fill Thou each needy one.
